MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH45 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in Urmson Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:08AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:39PM on 22nd January 2021.
